binding.name: Aβ42 aggregation inhibition
binding.description: Primary screen for compounds that inhibit Aβ42 peptide aggregation using ThT fluorescence. This assay measures the ability of compounds to prevent amyloid fibril formation.

binding.name: Beta-secretase (BACE1) inhibition
binding.description: High-throughput screen for BACE1 inhibitors using FRET-based assay. BACE1 is a key enzyme in amyloid precursor protein processing.

binding.name: Acetylcholinesterase inhibition
binding.description: Screen for AChE inhibitors using Ellman's colorimetric method

functional.name: Tau aggregation inhibition
functional.description: Screen for compounds preventing tau protein aggregation using ThT fluorescence assay

functional.name: NLRP3 inflammasome inhibition
functional.description: IL-1β secretion assay in THP-1 cells stimulated with LPS+ATP. Measures neuroinflammation modulation.

functional.name: TFEB nuclear translocation
functional.description: High-content imaging assay for TFEB nuclear localization in HeLa-TFEB-GFP cells

functional.name: Autophagy induction (LC3-II)
functional.description: Western blot quantification of LC3-II/LC3-I ratio in neuronal cells

adme.name: hiPSC-BBB permeability
adme.description: Blood-brain barrier permeability using human iPSC-derived brain microvascular endothelial cells (BMECs)

adme.name: P-gp efflux ratio
adme.description: MDCK-MDR1 bidirectional transport assay for P-glycoprotein substrate assessment

adme.name: Brain:Plasma ratio (mouse)
adme.description: In vivo CNS exposure measurement at 1h and 4h post-dose in CD-1 mice

adme.name: Human liver microsome stability
adme.description: Metabolic stability in pooled human liver microsomes with NADPH cofactors

safety.name: hERG channel inhibition
safety.description: Automated patch clamp (QPatch) assay for cardiac safety - IC50 determination

safety.name: Neuronal cytotoxicity
safety.description: Primary cortical neuron viability assay using CellTiter-Glo (ATP-based)

safety.name: Mitochondrial toxicity
safety.description: Seahorse XF assay measuring OCR and ECAR in SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cells

physicochemical.name: Kinetic solubility
physicochemical.description: Nephelometric solubility in PBS at pH 7.4
